plot: Three friends do everything it takes to impress the women interests in their lives, but sometimes it comes at the cost of some interesting advice... and maybe not the best advice at that.
plot_en: Three friends do everything it takes to impress the women interests in their lives, but sometimes it comes at the cost of some interesting advice... and maybe not the best advice at that.
plot_es: Three friends do everything it takes to impress the women interests in their lives, but sometimes it comes at the cost of some interesting advice... and maybe not the best advice at that.
title: Friendly Advice
